Question: This person appeared before the Illinois Supreme Court in 175 cases, in 51 as sole counsel, of which 31 were decided in his favor.
Hints: With almost no support in the South, this person swept the North and was elected president in 1860.
This person provided Grant with more troops and mobilized his party to renew its support of Grant in the war effort.
From 1853 to 1860, another of this person's largest clients was the Illinois Central Railroad.
